abstract: The e-commerce giant has agreed to pay nearly $700 million for a minority stake in Intime to form an “online-to-offline” joint retail business.
snippet: The e-commerce giant has agreed to pay nearly $700 million for a minority stake in Intime to form an “online-to-offline” joint retail business.
lead_paragraph: HONG KONG — Traditional retailers have been pushing into online sales for years. Now, one of the world’s biggest e-commerce companies is heading in the opposite direction: making a big bet on department stores.

headline.main: Alibaba Ventures Offline With Stake in Chinese Retail Group
headline.print_headline: Alibaba Bets on Offline, With Stake in a Retailer
